title: Discussion of selecting the new cabinet is underway
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) As the people of Sri Lanka have given an overwhelming victory in the General Election –April 2010 for the 7th parliament, the jubilant President Mahinda Rajapaksa has already started consultations with trusted top bureaucrats of his government on selection of the new cabinet. According…
